resources.string: Two best friends, Anshu and Manvi, Together they share their lives so grand-y. With laughter, love, and endless fun, Their bond will never come undone. They explore the world hand in hand, With memories to keep and stories to expand. Their friendship is a source of light, Bringing joy to every single sight. Anshu and Manvi, what a pair, Their bond so strong, beyond compare. They are there for each other, day and night, Guiding each other towards what\'s right. So here\'s to these two best friends, May their bond continue until the very end. Together, forever, Anshu and Manvi, Their friendship will always shine brightly.
